item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World! Just figured out how to setup a Gatsby Blog. Firs attempt at using gatsby. I unfortunately tried to do it the hard way, not…
item.content:encoded:
Hello World! Just figured out how to setup a Gatsby Blog. Firs attempt at using gatsby. I unfortunately tried to do it the hard way, not using the start-blog they have. Got several errors with GraphQL not finding the markdown files… lame! So I restarted with the starter-blog and it was up and running crazy fast.

I know this still looks like the same start-blog everyone has with Gatsby but I’ll come back and restyle it later.
